song.title: Friendly Fire
song.info:
Friendly fire Friendly fire Friendly fire
All I ever hoped, all I ever asked Was a piece of love from you but now it is all passed Now I'm on my own, and I feel alone That's all right as long as I remember what we've ??? I think you believe in everything but me I know that you can't express the many things you see So come with me, burning flames
Friendly fire Take me higher on your friendly fire Give me some more of your friendly fire Take me higher on your friendly fire Give me some more of your friendly fire
When the time has come and you're on the run Run away from all the things and deeds you've never done But you still deny every single lie You pretend that self-deception gives you wings to fly It is hard to breathe when you are a thief All the stolen feelings could just never heal your grief So come with me, burning flames
Friendly fire Take me higher on your friendly fire Give me some more of your friendly fire Take me higher on your friendly fire Give me some more of your friendly fire
Big bright burning lights glittering shimmer in the night I believe in everything you do When the night has come, and your baby's on the run Realise the one and only ???
Friendly fire Take me higher on your friendly fire Give me some more of your friendly fire Take me higher on your friendly fire Give me some more of your friendly fire
Big bright burning lights glittering shimmer in the night I believe in everything you do When the night has come, and your baby's on the run Realise the one and only ??? In you
